name: EMSIDE Landscape Architecture
tag_list: landscape-architecture, emside, green-roofs, gardens, playgrounds, waterfeature
overview:
EMSIDE Landscape Architecture is a company which design & create both public and private space. Our offer spans a wide variety of projects such as private gardens, green roofs, residential, surroundings of office buildings, public space including parks, plazas, squares, lawns, children playgrounds, external gyms, street areas, and more. We carry out trees surveys including existing greenery management documentation. Our office provide professional visualizations as an addition to concept design .We use our knowledge and experience to select the best technical solutions available on the landscape architecture market. We prepare project documentation for every stage of the investment process - starting from initial concept, through tender phase, to construction documentation.

We offer projects of:

  • private gardens
  • green roofs
  • residential complex surroundings
  • office buildings and shopping centers surroundings
  • parks and squares
  • children playgrounds
  • green interiors
  • private terraces, balconies

Documentation includes, among others :

  • tree survey, existing greenery management
  • planting plan
  • pavement plan
  • small architecture elements (chairs, benches, garden furniture, pergolas, fences, retaining walls, stairs, wooden terraces, bridges)
  • automatic watering system
  • lighting scheme
  • water feature design (water tanks, ponds, waterfalls, fountains)
  • planting maintenance scheme

Offer also includes

  • interior design
  • photorealistic visualizations
  • graphic design
